title:
There is a quote that states "Patience is a virtue."
Patience is not a virtue. It's not a skill. It's...

attachments.displayName:
There is a quote that states "Patience is a virtue." Patience is actually a choice. It isn't a skill. It's a decision.
Patient people have simply made it a habit to make the decision to wait for what they want/believe in.
Patience gives you the power to control yourself and control your life.
Learn to breathe, relax and feel comfortable when you know that's what you need to do, for what you want and what you know is best for you.

As Ralph Waldo Emerson said "Adopt the pace of nature; her secret is Patience."

object.content:
There is a quote that states "Patience is a virtue."
Patience is not a virtue. It's not a skill. It's actually a choice, a decision.
Patient people have simply made it a habit to make the decision to wait for what they want/believe in.
Waiting/Patience gives you the power to control yourself and control your life.
Choose to wait, to breathe, to relax, and to feel comfortable as you know that's what you need to do to obtain what you want and for what you know is best for you.
Wait and believe and it will come in the right time.

As Ralph Waldo Emerson said "Adopt the pace of nature; her secret is Patience."
